description.value: This small, clockwork navigational device hones in on mystical signals emitted by the Starstone resting at the heart of @Compendium[sfrpg.setting.hepqXl6gFvs5sDQu]{Absalom Station}, calculating the compass’s precise distance from and direction relative to the enigmatic font. While you are in the Pact Worlds system, this device lets you automatically know which direction @Compendium[sfrpg.setting.hepqXl6gFvs5sDQu]{Absalom Station} is in relation to your current location, and it grants you a +2 insight bonus to Piloting checks when astrogating throughout the Pact Worlds system.

modifiers.name: Starstone Compass
